#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int LL;
 
inline int ni()
{
	register int r=0,c;
	for(c=getchar_unlocked();c<=32;c=getchar_unlocked());
	for(;c>32;r=(r<<1)+(r<<3)+c-48,c=getchar_unlocked());
	return r;
}
 
int main()
{
      int t,n,m;LL nm;
      t=ni();
      while(t--)
      {
            m=ni();
            n=ni();
            if((n&1) && (m&1)){
                 nm = n;
                 nm*=m;
                 printf("%lld/%lld ",nm>>1,nm);
                 }
            else puts("1/2");
      }
      return 0;
}
